plot outline: Retired Colonel Gobind Kapoor is trying to settle his elder son in his business. His grandchildren have made his life miserable, regularly being suspended from school for their mischief. His younger song Aakash is doing well until a woman named Vaani shows up, kid in tow, claiming to be his wife. Aakash and Vaani were involved during college days but haven't seen each other in a long time, and now he denies all her allegations. Anjali, a close Kapoor family friend, lives with her suspicious husband Radheshyam Tiwari; when Anjali tries to help Aakash prove his innocence, Radheshyam Tiwari suspects Anjali and Aakash of having an affair and Anjali being pregnant by Aakash.
title: Hungama 2
plot: A sequel of the 2003 film Hungama.

Retired Colonel Gobind Kapoor is trying to settle his elder son in his business. His grandchildren have made his life miserable, regularly being suspended from school for their mischief. His younger song Aakash is doing well until a woman named Vaani shows up, kid in tow, claiming to be his wife. Aakash and Vaani were involved during college days but haven't seen each other in a long time, and now he denies all her allegations. Anjali, a close Kapoor family friend, lives with her suspicious husband Radheshyam Tiwari; when Anjali tries to help Aakash prove his innocence, Radheshyam Tiwari suspects Anjali and Aakash of having an affair and Anjali being pregnant by Aakash.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
